title: Replace lucide-react icons with generated image assets

requirements.summary: Replace specified lucide-react icons in App header/contact and booking dialog states with static generated image assets, keeping size/alignment and adding accessible alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/App.tsx` no longer imports `Phone`, `Mail`, or `MapPin` from `lucide-react`, and the header/contact UI uses `` elements with `/assets/generated/...` sources instead.

`frontend/src/components/BookServiceDialog.tsx` no longer imports `Loader2` or `CheckCircle2` from `lucide-react`, and both the pending (Submitting...) and success states use `` elements with `/assets/generated/...` sources instead.

Icon images render at the same apparent sizes as before (e.g., ~14â€“16px in the header row icons and ~24px in the Contact section, and ~16px spinner + ~64px success icon in the dialog), without breaking layout.
All replacement images include non-empty, English `alt` text (e.g., "Phone", "Email", "Location", "Loading", "Success").

file_operations.description: Remove `Phone`, `Mail`, and `MapPin` imports from `lucide-react` and replace their usages in the header/mobile header and Contact section with `` tags referencing `/assets/generated/phone-icon.dim_64x64.png`, `/assets/generated/email-icon.dim_64x64.png`, and `/assets/generated/location-icon.dim_64x64.png`. Preserve existing Tailwind sizing/alignment classes by applying equivalent `className` values to the `` elements (including `flex-shrink-0` and spacing), and add appropriate non-empty English `alt` text (e.g., "Phone", "Email", "Location").

Remove `Loader2` and `CheckCircle2` imports from `lucide-react` and replace: (1) the submitting spinner in the submit button with an `` referencing `/assets/generated/loading-spinner.dim_64x64.png` using the same sizing/alignment (`mr-2 h-4 w-4` equivalent) and retaining `animate-spin` for rotation if needed, and (2) the success state icon with an `` referencing `/assets/generated/success-check.dim_256x256.png` sized to match the prior `h-16 w-16`. Add appropriate non-empty English `alt` text (e.g., "Loading", "Success").

requirements.summary: Add required generated icon image files under frontend/public/assets/generated with exact required filenames for runtime loading via /assets/generated/ paths.
acceptanceCriteria: The app successfully loads these assets at runtime via `/assets/generated/<filename>` without backend changes.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static image asset file for the phone handset icon at the exact path `frontend/public/assets/generated/phone-icon.dim_64x64.png` so it can be referenced at runtime via `/assets/generated/phone-icon.dim_64x64.png`.

Add the generated static image asset file for the envelope/mail icon at the exact path `frontend/public/assets/generated/email-icon.dim_64x64.png` so it can be referenced at runtime via `/assets/generated/email-icon.dim_64x64.png`.

Add the generated static image asset file for the map pin/location icon at the exact path `frontend/public/assets/generated/location-icon.dim_64x64.png` so it can be referenced at runtime via `/assets/generated/location-icon.dim_64x64.png`.

Add the generated static image asset file for the circular loading spinner icon at the exact path `frontend/public/assets/generated/loading-spinner.dim_64x64.png` so it can be referenced at runtime via `/assets/generated/loading-spinner.dim_64x64.png`.

Add the generated static image asset file for the success checkmark-in-circle icon at the exact path `frontend/public/assets/generated/success-check.dim_256x256.png` so it can be referenced at runtime via `/assets/generated/success-check.dim_256x256.png`.
